name: Extract Volumes from Compose
description: Extract volume mappings from Docker Compose file and convert them to LXC volume format. Relative paths (./data) are converted to volumes/<project>/data format.

parameters.name: Compose Project Name
parameters.description: Project name for Docker Compose (used for named volumes). Defaults to hostname if not provided.

commands.description: Extract volumes from Docker Compose file and convert to LXC format
